nodes.body: brgyud ‘debs, bla ma brgyud pa’i gsol ‘debs [TBRC T11] Ex: ‘Dul ba sdom rgyun gsol ‘debs (W13525), Rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul mthu chen gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs Hri lnga'i sgra dbyangs srid gsum 'gengs byed ldeb (W22642).
